meanings.definition: Capable of being turned inside out.
meanings.sent1: The eversible umbrella easily flips inside out during strong winds.
meanings.sent2: The eversible sock can be inverted to reveal a different color.
meanings.sent3: The magician's eversible hat surprised the audience when it transformed inside out.
meanings.sent4: Her mood was eversible, like a reversible jacket changing with the weather.
meanings.sent5: The eversible glove demonstrated its flexibility by turning inside out effortlessly.

meanings.sent1: The eversible pocket on the backpack can be pulled out for extra storage.
meanings.sent2: The eversible flower petals open up to the sun in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The eversible balloon inflated and expanded outward, surprising the children.
meanings.sent4: His eversible personality always showed his emotions outwardly.
meanings.sent5: The eversible tent extended outward to provide more space for camping gear.

meanings.sent1: The eversible decision to cancel the event was quickly reversed by popular demand.
meanings.sent2: The eversible mechanism allowed the clock to go backward in time.
meanings.sent3: The eversible movie plot had the audience laughing as scenes played in reverse.
meanings.sent4: Their eversible friendship endured ups and downs, always finding a way back together.
meanings.sent5: The eversible escalator changed direction smoothly, surprising the commuters.
